title: Essential Windows 10 (Computer Essentials)
features: Teach yourself how to navigate and use the latest version of Microsoft Windows.Now in full color, this guide explores...*  Windows 10's new features, menus and utilities*  Setting up your computer, downloading and upgrading to Windows 10*  Navigating around Windows 10 using file explorer, task view and the start menu*  Using the desktop and running applications*  Using Tablets*  Using Cortana virtual assistant and Microsoft Edge Web Browser*  Using OneDrive*  Backing up your important data with FileHistory*  Antivirus and internet safety*  Downloading & watching videos and watching DVDs*  Downloading & listening to music*  Staying in touch friends, family and colleagues using Mail, Calendar & Skype*  Maintaining Windows 10, scanning drives for errors and basic recovery procedures and more...Clear instruction, and easy-to-follow tutorials with illustrated photographs, graphics and screen prints, guide you through the procedures every step of the way. Great for beginners, novices, seniors, ordinary home users, students and even experienced users needing a refresher or update.If you want to get up and running quickly and easily with the new Windows 10, this is the guide you need.
description: Kevin Wilson, a practicing computer engineer and tutor, has had a passion for gadgets, cameras, computers and technology for many years. After graduating with a masters in computer science, software engineering & multimedia systems, Kevin has worked in the computer industry supporting and working with many different types of computer systems. He has served as a tutor running specialist lessons on film making, visual effects, IT lessons and computer literacy in schools. He has taught in colleges in South Africa, and worked as a tutor for adult education in England running IT courses such as beginner's IT, CLAIT, ECDL and ICT Advanced. His books have become a valuable resource amongst the students. His latest works, the computer essentials series, modelled on the philosophy "if you can't explain something simply, you haven't understood it well enough", aims to bring a simplified approach to computer training and breaks down computing terms, tasks, operating systems and software into simple concepts with easy to follow steps and plenty of visual aids. It is his hope that these books will help you as much as they've helped us get to grips with the latest technology. The best-selling computer fundamentals series was created in the hope that it will help people to use their computer with greater joy, understanding, productivity and efficiency. To help students and people in countries like South Africa and India who have never used a computer before. It is his hope that they will get the same benefits from computer technology as we do. So get yourself a copy today and help us make a difference in someone's life.
